name: Ozh & COLOURlovers' Admin CSS Designer
author: Ozh

sections.description:
The Admin CSS Designer is an addictive plugin that will pull colorful palettes from COLOURlovers.com and make admin CSS for you. You can make, edit and tweak your admin CSS real time and visually, with no coding involved.

For a more detailed documentation, screenshots, tips and a video tutorial, please visit its official page: Admin CSS Designer

Tip: To keep track of this plugin’s evolution and features, you are advised to subscribe to the author’s feed
sections.installation:
1. Unzip & upload the plugin directory inside your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Head to your Profile page

short_description: Make your own Admin CSS with a little help from COLOURlovers. Edit, tweak and save CSS real time!
